children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-k8s/0 [executing] active: 
  mysql-k8s/1 [executing] active: Primary
  mysql-k8s/2 [executing] active: 
  mysql-router-k8s/0 [idle] unknown:

test_build_and_deploy
tags: @pytest.mark.skipif(False, reason='Skips juju <3.1.x as we have a dependency for self-signed-certificates')

children.name:
asyncio.exceptions.TimeoutError: Timed out waiting for model:
mysql-test-app/0 [idle] waiting:

AssertionError: None of the units are upgraded
assert '+testupgrade' in 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:42:12Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address       Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.158.141         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.158.137         Router 8.0.39 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+002767a
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.158.139         Router 8.0.39 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+002767a
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.158.142         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.158.136         Last written value=24560
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp
test   microk8s-localhost  microk8s/localhost  3.4.3    unsupported  02:42:12Z

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message
mysql-k8s         8.0.37-0ubuntu0.22.04.3  active       1  mysql-k8s         8.0/edge     208  10.152.183.157  no       
mysql-router-k8s  8.0.39-0ubuntu0.22.04.1  waiting      3  mysql-router-k8s  8.0/edge       0  10.152.183.198  no       installing agent
mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.32   no       Last written value=24560

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address       Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.158.141         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.158.137         Router 8.0.39 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+002767a
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.158.139         Router 8.0.39 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+002767a
mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.158.142         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.158.136         Last written value=24560
' = get_juju_status('test')
 +    where 'test' = <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f75d556a620>.name
 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f75d556a620> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f75d53bae90>.model
